description: The esophageal biopsy reports with the histological finding of Barrett's mucosa that contains a statement about dysplasia. (present, absent, or indefinite and if peresent, contains appropriate grading)

cptCodeModifiers.description: The esophageal biopsy reports with the histological finding of Barrett's mucosa that contains a statement about dysplasia. (present, absent, or indefinite) not performed for medical reasons (eg, malignant neoplasm or absence of intestinal metaplasia)

The esophageal biopsy reports with the histological finding of Barrett's mucosa that does not contain a statement about dysplasia. (present, absent, or indefinite and if present, contains appropriate grading), reason not otherwise specified.
